headline: Aptiv to Present at UBS Global Industrials and Transportation Conference
summary: Aptiv PLC , a global technology company focused on making mobility safer, greener and more connected, will present at UBS Global Industrials and Transportation Conference, December 4 at 8 a.m. Eastern...

headline: Aptiv PLC (APTV): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Aptiv PLC (APTV) on Rock and Turner Investment Analysis’ Substack by James Emanuel. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on APTV. Aptiv PLC (APTV)’s share was trading at $52.93 as of Nov 15th. APTV’s trailing and forward P/E were 5.89 and 7.77 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. […]
